function.description:
Add the provided XML string as a child to node, optionally at a provided position.
Returns the newly created node.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Assuming we have an XML file note.xml which contains the following:
example.code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <note id="1"> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> <comment>Comments are welcome.</comment> </note>
